Ben and Burman

 18 Oct 2008
005
Comments
Guest: Ben and Burman
Hosts: Garth Braithwaite and Leif Wells
Producer: Brad Feuerstein

Ben Giroux and Burman (yes, just Burman), join us to discuss their upcoming web series, aptly named Ben and Burman. We talk a bit the process of pitching a show, Burman’s odd behaviors, and Ben’s youth as the son of comic store owners. Check out the upcoming episodes on the show website and the trailer can be found on Dailymotion.
